Package managerpro.Controller

Class CreateUserController

java.lang.Object
managerpro.Controller.CreateUserController
public class CreateUserController
extends java.lang.Object
This is a Controller class for the create user -view. It gathers the information from the user interface, validates it and sends it to database. On initialisation it adds listeners to TextFields and calls getConstraint violations when the focus is lost from the TextField.
Author:
OTP7

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      FXML initializer method. Attaches listeners to TextFields that call getConstraintViolations(Class, String, String) to validate the users input.

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable()

    • handleRowSelection

      private void handleRowSelection​(UsersEntity selectedUser)

    • getConstraintViolations

      private <T> java.lang.String getConstraintViolations​(java.lang.Class<T> aClass, java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.String value)
      Type Parameters:
      T - Takes classes of generic type
      Parameters:
      aClass - class to be validated. It needs to have the annotations for the validator
      fieldName - field to validate
      value - value to be set to field
      Returns:
      Returns an empty string if all is fine, else return error generated by validator

    • handleCreateUser

      public void handleCreateUser()
      Method for handling the creation of the user. Checks if the passwords match and are not empty Creates a UsersDao and uses it to check if username is unique (no such user found in DB). Then creates a new UsersEntity form the user interface data (if validation is ok), adds it to databse and clears the user creation form.

    • IsInvalidPassword

      private boolean IsInvalidPassword()

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser()
      Checks if user is selected, the password is valid, username is unique. Then updates the row in databse, sets status message and clears the from.

    • IsInvalidUsername

      private boolean IsInvalidUsername()

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser()
      If an user is selected, the method deletes the user from database, sets a status message and resets the form

    • resetForm

      public void resetForm()
      Clears the textfields in the form and sets focus on the username field.
